医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
植物分生组织中干细胞控制的新见解弗莱堡大学的研究人员发现 HAN 分子是与 WOX5 一起控制植物生长的重要调节因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-insights-into-stem-cell-control-in-plant-meristems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-insights-into-stem-cell-control-in-plant-meristems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c90a27da-2a2d-406a-97fd-6439bfd0d381 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:26:00 -0400 New insights into stem cell control in plant meristems
TCT医疗科技论坛探讨心血管医学创新随着医疗保健领域变革步伐的加快，心血管医学中最紧迫的问题需要立即得到答案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Exploring-innovations-in-cardioangio-medicine-at-TCT-MedTech-Forum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Exploring-innovations-in-cardioangio-medicine-at-TCT-MedTech-Forum.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1383401e-41cc-4f63-9122-927942736387 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:19:00 -0400 Exploring innovations in cardiovascular medicine at TCT MedTech Forum
了解高密度脂蛋白胆固醇质量与阿尔茨海默病风险之间的惊人联系较高水平的 HDL-C（被称为“好胆固醇”）已被证明与阿尔茨海默病风险增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Understanding-the-surprising-link- Between-HDL-cholesterol-quality-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Understanding-the-surprising-link- Between-HDL-cholesterol-quality-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=957671c9-5d7a-4f0c-9fb8-ba016392e85e Sat, 12 Oct 2024 09:10:00 -0400 Understanding the surprising link between HDL cholesterol quality and Alzheimer's risk
新的计算管道彻底改变了个性化癌症疫苗设计路德维希癌症研究中心的科学家们开发了一个完整的、从头到尾的计算管道，集成了肿瘤的多种分子和遗传分析以及 T 细胞的特定分子靶点，并利用人工智能算法使用其输出为患者设计个性化癌症疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-computational-pipeline-revolutionizes-personalized-cancer-vaccine-design.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/New-computational-pipeline-revolutionizes-personalized-cancer-vaccine-design.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7cf9995-28cb-4e10-a04f-790e6fe5329c Sat, 12 Oct 2024 08:51:00 -0400 New computational pipeline revolutionizes personalized cancer vaccine design
发现独特的蛋白质复合物影响大脑功能和焦虑蒙特利尔大学及其附属蒙特利尔临床研究所 (IRCM) 的科学家发现了蛋白质复合物在脑细胞连接的结构组织和功能以及特定认知行为中的独特作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Unique- Protein-complex-found-to-influence-brain-function-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Unique- Protein-complex-found-to-influence-brain-function-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f56e692-e68e-4bf6-998e-7d96482c628d Sat, 12 Oct 2024 08:38:43 -0400 Unique protein complex found to influence brain function and anxiety
研究人员揭示蛋白质GBP1在免疫防御中的机制GBP1 蛋白是我们身体抵御病原体自然防御的重要组成部分。这种物质通过将细菌和寄生虫包裹在蛋白质外壳中来对抗细菌和寄生虫，但迄今为止，这种物质是如何做到这一点的仍然未知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Researchers-uncover-mechanism-of- Protein-GBP1-in-immune-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Researchers-uncover-mechanism-of- Protein-GBP1-in-immune-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21d9566c-13c6-4bc7-a4f5-88c38885020f Sat, 12 Oct 2024 08:34:35 -0400 Researchers uncover mechanism of protein GBP1 in immune defense
密歇根大学获得资助研究阿片类药物使用障碍的疼痛管理密歇根大学将利用新的 360 万美元联邦拨款来研究手术后疼痛和阿片类药物如何影响阿片类药物使用障碍患者、如何调整指南以解决术后疼痛以及如何预防阿片类药物相关危害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/University-of-Michigan-receives-grant-to-study-pain-management-in-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/University-of-Michigan-receives-grant-to-study-pain-management-in-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58f3b517-79c2-4b56-841c-d04fcc67fc57 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 08:20:53 -0400 University of Michigan receives grant to study pain management in opioid use disorder
新生儿发现炎症性肠病的早期症状在整个西方世界，这些无法治愈的慢性严重疾病的患病率正在上升。仅在丹麦，就有 50,000 人患有克罗恩病或溃疡性结肠炎，这意味着过去 20 年来病例数增加了一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Early-signs-of-炎症-肠-疾病-检测到-in-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Early-signs-of-lingual-bowel-disease-Detected-in-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58f61326-1e10-4186-9789-548c75277aba Sat, 12 Oct 2024 08:15:35 -0400 Early signs of inflammatory bowel disease detected in newborns
乳腺癌患者通过 YouTube 找到希望和联系巴斯克大学 (UPV/EHU) 的一项研究确定了与这种疾病最相关的 YouTube 视频以及发表评论的人的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Breast-cancer-病人-find-hope-and-connection-through-YouTube.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Breast-cancer-病人-find-hope-and-connection-through-YouTube.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cef15f7-777c-466e-ae49-5f06fcd02bdd Sat, 12 Oct 2024 08:07:04 -0400 Breast cancer patients find hope and connection through YouTube
医学成像中的人工智能并不能保证效率的提高人工智能 (AI) 在医院和患者护理中的使用正在稳步增加。尤其是在放射学等影像占比较高的专业领域，人工智能早已成为日常临床实践的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/AI-in-medical-imaging-does-not-guarantee-increased-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/AI-in-medical-imaging-does-not-guarantee-increased-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee3e3ffe-f527-4e8b-b7bc-baeddb548dd1 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 07:59:50 -0400 AI in medical imaging does not guarantee increased efficiency
